features: Ultra Quiet Fan: Our portable fan is equipped with a powerful brushless motor to reduce noise, providing strong airflow that can be used for over 25,000 hours while being quieter than ordinary fans. The minimum noise level of this desk fan is close to 25dB, making it ideal for sleeping, studying, and working.

Adjustable Angles & Three-Speed Airflow: This compact fan has three speeds of wind speed, so you can choose the air volume according to your needs. It comes with a 180-degree swivel stand that can be placed or hung to meet different usage angles and scenarios. You can hang it in your tent when camping or use it handheld when you're feeling hot outside.

USB Powered Rechargeable: Our fan has a built-in 2000mAh battery that can last different times when fully charged (about 4-5 hours to fully charge), depending on different wind speed or usage scenarios.

Compact Size - 6.8in: This mini personal fan is cordless, compact in size (6.85.71.4in), and lightweight (0.50lb). You can put it in your handbag or camping backpack, making it perfect for indoor use, camping, travel, and more.

Package Included: Desktop Fan×1;120cm Type-C Cable×1; User Manual×1; Packaging Box ×1.. If you have any issues while using JOSTRY small USB fans, please feel free to contact us. We will respond to you within 24 hours. Enhancing customer experience is our service tenet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Mini Fan Bringing you a refreshing experience for the summer! The JOSTRY MINI fan is equipped with 5 blades and a brushless motor,Release the delicate and soft wind,no Headache After Blowing for a Long Time. Ultra-thin design, only 1.4" thick, can be easily packed into bags or handbags. very suitable for indoor or outdoor use. Featuring 3 adjustable wind speeds and an adjustable angle bracket, you can easily place it on a table or hang it somewhere for indoor and outdoor activities such as reading, camping, and traveling.
Built-in 2000mAh Battery, Can Work about 4 -12 hours
A Great Sompanion for Scorching Summer Days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice little fan
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in the heat wave thinking I could put it up in the A/C duct register to help pull some of the cold air into the room, and it fit like a charm. It's super thin, so it fit between the register and the duct work. It's just the right size to fit in the 7x9 space that is there. It would be nice if it had a more analog power switch, because I'm afraid of unplugging it and having the battery drain and then have to take the register back down to access it and turn in back on. (I guess I could poke it with a screwdriver or something if I had to, and honestly it wasn't that hard to put in there.) The fan moves quite a bit of air to help pull the cold out of the A/C unit, meaning that there is a noticeable difference between the vent with the fan and the other vents in the house. It's a whisper silent fan, hardly noticeable sound from it on the highest setting. I think I'm going to order a few more of these to put in the rest of the duct vents, and heck, they're nice little fans to have around in case of a power outage or any other reason you might want a battery powered fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m at that age where I’m cold one minute and then burning up the next. Ladies… if you know… you know!This little fan is AMAZING! I can usually just use it on low while watching tv and such to feel comfortable. Sometimes I have to crank it up on the highest setting, but after a couple minutes I turn it back down.On the lowest setting it is very quiet. It’s a tad noisy on the highest setting, but what fan isn’t?!It seems to charge quickly, and it holds a charge and can run for quite a lot time. You can also use it while it is plugged in. I like that it can be toted around with me, without having to find an outlet for it.My son and husband liked it so much that we bought a second one, they like to take them camping with them and use them in our canvas tent when it gets too warm inside.Obviously I would purchase again, because I already did. I would recommend this to anybody needing a good quality, portable, personal sized fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Little Fan I Ever Purchased!
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased many desktop fans over the years, and this Jostry Mini Desk Fan is by far the best. It can be angled for comfort, is easy to carry with the open handle, and has three speeds (low, medium or high). Best of all, the battery life is amazing!I am a "hot sleeper", so in addition to keeping the air conditioning on at night all year long, even when it is snowing outside, I have been using a tower fan with a remote control in the corner of the bedroom. I have owned this little fan for a month now, and instead of the tower fan, I have been moving it every night from my home office desk to my nightstand in the bedroom. I can angle it toward my pillow, and I have been sleeping better than ever. It has been so reliable and lasts all night with battery power to spare that I just ordered a second one -- this time in white -- so I don't need to keep moving the one I have.For such a low cost, this is an exceptional product and will make a great gift. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great mini fan however, this is my second fan I purchased and everytime I take out the charger, it breaks off inside of it. I am not rough with pulling out the charger and made sure the second time around to be extra careful and it still happened. Luckily I found another charger that fits. Otherwise, the fan is good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works great and the price is right. Already charged up when I took it out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s so good and you can take it every where with you. I had to buy another one because my son stole mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact but strong
reviews.reviewText: Super compact fan but surprisingly strong. We ordered this for my daughter to take to college and are impressed with the size and power. The fan is easily adjusted to the angle that bests fits your need and has three speeds. This is rechargeable and will operate with no plug in required. (This post is sponsored but all opinions are my own).The color is nice and fits with the decor of her dorm room. Overall very pleased with this compact fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Fan-loud hum
reviews.reviewText: The fan is a nice breeze and lasts almost through the night on a full charge, however, there is a definitive hum that is loud.
